title: 4A Microlearning Course to Address Learning Gaps in Filipino 11

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Need to cultivate advanced Filipino language proficiency for scientific and technical professionals to write academic documents.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the historical background of Filipino and apply it in academic contexts (with proficiency ≥80%).
Learners ensure logical coherence in scientific reports by utilizing five or more cohesive devices.
Learners can analyze three or more language usage patterns in digital media and apply them to research papers.
Learners interpret language-related concepts through discussion formats and generate revised drafts incorporating peer feedback.
Learners demonstrate comprehensive Filipino communication skills through project-based assessments.

resources: Wix-Based Digital Module Compatible with Smartphones
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
